review: Works perfectly and is unobstrusive. So glad I got it.

review: Remote paired at first but then stopped working as soon as the Roku update was applied.  Not a fan of this device at all.  The video quality seemed poor on the few things I was able to stream.

review: Bought this as my second Roku just for travel purposes.  Good on any TV with an HDMI port on hotel televisions, cottage at the beach, rental condo in Florida.

review: works perfect try well....not sure I am totally off cable but this is a nice alternative with limitations.

review: Works as expected.  It does come with a power cord, so you don't need to purchase a separate one.
